segments.text: Mom , Happy mother's Day ! Here's my card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a surprise ! Thanks.It ' s beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your love and care over the years , I appreciate it , mom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the best card I ever received .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , what can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing , son . I'm already very happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about dinner tonight ? My treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually . I prefer we eat at home.We ' ll have more time to catch up that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry I haven't dropped in that much these past few years.Business kept me too busy , I apologize .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don't mention it . I'm proud of you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , mom . I love you so much !
segments.speaker: S1
